title: Conservation Voltage Reduction (CVR)
description: A distribution management system (DMS) needs to optimize feeder voltage levels to reduce energy consumption while keeping voltage within acceptable limits.

tasks.description: Continuously monitor real-time voltage data from sensors across the feeder.
Calculate the optimal voltage setpoint at the substation that lowers overall voltage without causing a low-voltage violation for any customer.
tasks.expected_outcome: System determines the target voltage can be lowered by 2%.

tasks.description: Send commands to the substation's load tap changer and downstream voltage regulators to implement the new setpoint.
tasks.expected_outcome: System successfully adjusts the field devices to the new voltage profile.
